Consequentemente, eu n√£o me lembro de nenhum momento na minha vida em que eu n√£o tenha ouvido m√∫sica, desde a minha inf√¢ncia! Cresci em uma √©poca muito boa e consegui acompanhar o melhor do final dos 90‚Äôs e tudo dos 00‚Äôs! Mas tamb√©m costumo ouvir diversos estilos de rock, rap, hip-hop, blues e reggae.

charlie.title: Como tudo come√ßou?

description.1: Entrei na Charlie na primeira equipe! Um time pequeno e multidisciplinar.
description.2: Meu desafio era criar todos os produtos da empresa, realizar products discoverys, benchmarks, criar as primeiras interfaces, componentes e come√ßar a estruturar uma biblioteca de componentes no Figma.
description.3: Fora isso, tamb√©m estava como respons√°vel pelo desenvolvimento front-end! Sim, bem dific√≠l... Mas demos conta!
description.4: O desafio era criar um site para o Charlie, para inserirmos a marca no mercado.

description.6: Os objetivos foram alcan√ßados, por√©m sab√≠amos que esse site seria tempor√°rio devido ao r√°pido desenvovlimento da empresa e a procura de clientes e investidores, ent√£o come√ßamos a pensar e projetar uma plataforma para realizar reservas e outras features.

charlie.subtitle: E um pouco do que est√° por vir da nova plataforma do Charlie

buddy.welcome: Por meio do aplicativo da Buddy, os usu√°rios poder√£o adotar e ajudar c√£es diretamente com ONGs e protetores cadastrados, registrar animais abandonados ou para resgate, sendo recompensados por isso com cupons de descontos de empresas apoiadoras
buddy.title: Manifest
buddy.subtitle: Um pouco do que est√° por vir da Buddy

description.2: Quem nunca ouviu um cachorro chorar de fome ou o viu vagando pelas ruas revirando lixo? Cachorros e gatos s√£o abandonados todos os dias pelos mais diversos motivos. Nenhum deles, justific√°vel.
description.3: Quantas vezes voc√™ j√° viu um animal abandonado, sentiu pena e, infelizmente, n√£o sabia o que fazer? Quantas pessoas j√° passaram pela mesma situa√ß√£o?
description.4: Voc√™ abandonaria um filho ou uma m√£e por problemas comportamentais ou falta de espa√ßo em casa? N√≥s acreditamos que n√£o. Acreditamos que voc√™ faz parte da solu√ß√£o e n√£o do problema.
description.5: Com a Buddy, apenas uma ado√ß√£o √© poss√≠vel salvar vidas. Gra√ßas a voc√™, tudo pode mudar para um animal de rua ou em um abrigo, impactando at√© mesmo na sua vida e na de outras pessoas.
description.6: Podemos mudar a vida de pessoas e animais com intera√ß√µes simples, pois acreditamos que um pequeno gesto faz a diferen√ßa. A Buddy quer juntar colaboradores que acreditam na causa e que a cada tarefa realizada, a cada ideia concebida e a cada decis√£o tomada podemos nos aproximar cada vez mais do nosso objetivo.
description.7: Sim, n√≥s somos uma empresa, mas apenas isso n√£o basta. Somos mais que isso. Somos uma comunidade. Somos pessoas. Somos n√≥s, voc√™, seu vizinho, seu chefe, seu funcion√°rio, sua fam√≠lia. N√≥s temos rostos. Rostos que n√£o se viram mais para encarar um abandono.
description.8: N√≥s da Buddy temos a convic√ß√£o que nosso movimento pode ser t√£o forte que ser√° imposs√≠vel n√£o olhar por animais de rua.
description.9: At√© ent√£o, ignorar um animal abandonado ou em um abrigo pela dificuldade em se fazer algo era compreens√≠vel. Com a Buddy, a op√ß√£o √© sua: passe reto ou lute por eles.
description.10: Ainda n√£o lan√ßamos o aplicativo da Buddy! Mas voc√™ j√° pode acompanhar o projeto pelas redes sociais!

smash.welcome: O Smash √© um app onde voc√™ encontrar√° diversos conte√∫dos relacionados a m√∫sica e animes. O melhor lugar para voc√™ encontrar uma comunidade ativa em produzir conte√∫dos e os cl√°ssicos AMV's!
smash.subtitle: Um pouco do que est√° por vir do Smash

description.1: O Smash √© uma rede social sem fins lucrativos para postagem de conte√∫dos realcionamos a animes e mang√°s! Voc√™ pode criar seus pr√≥prios v√≠deos com as cenas mais marcantes e com m√∫sicas que encaixam perfeitamente com seu v√≠deo!
description.2: Para as pr√≥ximas vers√µes pensaremos em como voc√™ pode editar e criar seu pr√≥prio v√≠deo direto do seu celular, compartilhando no seu perfil do Smash ou onde quiser!
description.3: Essa ideia foi criada por mim e mais um amigo, no intuito de estudar novas tecnologias, tend√™ncias e conceitos de experi√™ncia do usu√°rio com um p√∫blico bem espec√≠fico.
description.4: O projeto est√° sendo desenvolvido bem aos ‚Äùpoucos‚Äù por ser um projeto de estudo e ‚Äùfor fun‚Äù!

intro.title: I've been working with design and technology for 10 years
intro.description: I'm looking for more and more interesting and challenging projects, I always end up trying to take risks to get even greater results than I can expect. I believe that behind great projects there are extraordinary people who work as a single team, with a single common purpose and that is what attracts me the most! Meet extraordinary professionals and surround myself with good people.

design.description: Thinking about every detail of how to build a product that will add value to both the company and the people who will use it. I think like a designer, but I have the soul of someone in business, because, at the end of the day, if the interface is just ‚Äúbeautiful‚Äù and doesn't bring results, my work has not reached its goals. I try more and more to participate in brilliant ideas and lead people to become better professionals, I believe that I develop more and more and am surprised by the new talents that I find during my journey and that motivates me to go further.

engineer.description: Conceiving an idea that even before was on ‚Äúpaper‚Äù, giving life to interactions and conceiving experiences that were created together with the designers. To develop authentic software that will ‚Äúfrighten‚Äù the competition! Technology, every day, advances at a gigantic speed! I believe that we are still experiencing the beginning of a future with endless possibilities. I always maintain study and practice periods so that I can add knowledge to colleagues and teams at all times.

myself.description: I work to give my children a good future! I'm very attached to animals in general, I ended up falling for IT because it was easy with my skills (apart from a very peculiar story, if I may say so, but leave that for another time üòÇ), but if I changed areas, for sure I would be a veterinarian.

music.title: Music
music.description: I was born into a family where Rock was the boss. And since I was a child I have a passion for Rock and especially Red Hot Chili Peppers. Consequently, I can't remember a single moment in my life when I haven't listened to music, since my childhood! I grew up in a very good time and managed to keep up with the best of the late 90's and everything from the 00's! But I also tend to listen to different styles of rock, rap, hip-hop, blues and reggae.

read.title: Reading
read.description: I've read several books on Design, Business, Technology and Biographies that have helped me in many ways and that have brought inspiration or even changed my way of thinking about some subjects. But now nothing is better than reading (or watching)...

charlie.welcome: Charlie transforms the way of living and traveling, merging the world of the hotel with that of home, offering a stay experience and on-demand services for short, medium and long term stays.
charlie.title: How it all began?

description.1: I joined Charlie in the first team! A small and multidisciplinary team.
description.2: My challenge was to create all the company's products, perform product discoveries, benchmarks, create the first interfaces, components and start structuring a component library in Figma.
description.3: Other than that, I was also responsible for front-end development! Yes, it was very difficult... But we did it!
description.4: The challenge was to create a website for Charlie, so that we could insert the brand in the market.
description.5: So we created an institutional website, to explain a little about the business, products, and try to generate some leads in relation to real estate investors.
description.6: The objectives were achieved, but we knew that this site would be temporary due to the rapid development of the company and the demand from customers and investors, so we started to think and design a platform to make reservations and other features.
description.7: So we set out to develop Charlie's app. It is a hybrid app, developed in Flutter. I participated in the creation of the app's interface and also in the development.

charlie.subtitle: And some of what's to come from Charlie's new platform

buddy.welcome: Through the Buddy app, users will be able to adopt and help dogs directly with registered NGOs and protectors, register abandoned animals or animals for rescue, being rewarded with discount coupons from supporting companies
buddy.title: Manifest
buddy.subtitle: And some of what's to come from Buddy

description.1: With Buddy, just one adoption can save lives. Thanks to you, everything can change for a street animal or in a shelter, even impacting your life and other people's lives.
description.2: Who hasn't heard a dog cry from hunger or seen it roaming the streets rummaging through garbage? Dogs and cats are abandoned every day for a variety of reasons. None of them justifiable.
description.3: How many times have you seen an abandoned animal, felt sorry for it and unfortunately didn't know what to do? How many people have been through the same situation?
description.4: Would you abandon a child or a mother due to behavioral problems or lack of space at home? We believe not. We believe that you are part of the solution, not the problem.
description.5: With Buddy, just one adoption can save lives. Thanks to you, everything can change for a street animal or in a shelter, even impacting your life and other people's lives.
description.6: We can change the lives of people and animals with simple interactions, because we believe that a small gesture makes a difference. Buddy wants to bring together employees who believe in the cause and that with each task carried out, with each idea conceived and with each decision made, we can get closer and closer to our goal.
description.7: Yes, we are a company, but that alone is not enough. We are more than that. We are a community. We are people. It's us, you, your neighbor, your boss, your employee, your family. We have faces. Faces that no longer turn around to face abandonment.
description.8: We at Buddy are convinced that our movement can be so strong that it will be impossible not to look after stray animals.
description.9: Until then, ignoring an animal abandoned or in a shelter because of the difficulty in doing something was understandable. With the Buddy, the choice is yours: pass them by or fight for them.
description.10: We haven't released the Buddy app yet! But you can now follow the project on social media!

smash.welcome: Smash is an app where you'll find a variety of anime and music related content. The best place for you to find an active community producing content and classic AMV's!
smash.subtitle: And some of what's to come from Smash

description.1: Smash is a non-profit social network for posting content related to anime and manga! You can create your own videos with the most memorable scenes and music that fits perfectly with your video!
description.2: For the next versions we'll think about how you can edit and create your own video right from your phone, sharing it on your Smash profile or wherever you want!
description.3: This idea was created by me and another friend, in order to study new technologies, trends and user experience concepts with a very specific audience.
description.4: The project is being developed ‚Äúlittle by little‚Äù as it is a study project and ‚Äúfor fun‚Äù!
